description.value:
Whenever you take a long rest, you can choose a season to reflect your emotional state and corresponding spell to prepare. You can cast the chosen spell once without expending a spell slot and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, the chosen spell is cast as a 2nd-level spell. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells (chosen when you select this subrace).

SeasonSpell
SpringCharm Person
SummerCommand
AutumnHeroism
WinterSleep
